message.content:
1. A comparison was made of the haemodynamic effects of riociguat.
2. The comparison involved patients with inoperable chronic thromboembolic pulmonary hypertension (CTEPH).
3. The comparison also involved patients with persistent/recurrent CTEPH after pulmonary endarterectomy.
4. The comparison was part of the Chronic Thromboembolic Pulmonary Hypertension Soluble Guanylate Cyclase–Stimulator Trial 1 study.

messages.content:
Statement: We compared the haemodynamic effects of riociguat in patients with inoperable chronic thromboembolic pulmonary hypertension (CTEPH) or persistent/recurrent CTEPH after pulmonary endarterectomy in the Chronic Thromboembolic Pulmonary Hypertension Soluble Guanylate Cyclase–Stimulator Trial 1 study.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
